website_summaries.verdict: A classic-looking salt grinder with a sharp long-lasting mechanism for durability.
pros: Company makes a pepper mill to match
Knob on top helps to adjust granular size
Stainless steel  and ceramic interior mechanism
cons: Model is a little harder to fill than others on the market, but can be filled easily with a funnel

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and functional
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, does exactly what it says it does, product arrived free of damage. Small update: -2 stars the attractive dark finish quickly began to erode after exposure to moisture. Take care that you don't leave this grinder resting on any surfaces that are even remotely wet, or that bottom edge will wick up the moisture and begin to crack. It wasn't like I submerged this thing, either. Disappointing that a kitchen product would react this poorly to a little countertop water.
customer_reviews.author: Asp

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: As many people have commented, removing the SKU label damages the finish. Work around... I spayed on three coats of Rust-Oleum. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesman

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a 5 Star steak house pepper grinder!
customer_reviews.text: After my first order was shown as delivered but never received, Amazon didn't bat an eye and sent me out another, 100% free of additional charge. Customer first service is why I shop Amazon. As to the Pepper Grinder? SUPERB! Beautiful and well crafted, this grinder would be right at home in any 5 star Prime Steak House, yet just as at home under a Palapa next to a charcoal BBQ. Perfect size, shape and texture to be ground by a professional waiter or a clumsy husband. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Retired In Baja

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Effective Kitchen Addition
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is a beautiful addition to our kitchen and serves its purpose very well. The silver piece at the top unscrews very easily for a quick refill, and there aren't a bunch of moving parts. Simple, elegant, and effective. Much like other people have mentioned, I wish there weren't so much salt on the counter after it's been sitting. But if you give it a few good shakes after you're done grinding, much of the leftovers can be prevented! Overall, my husband and I love it and use it multiples times on a daily basis!
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Knob Doesn't Work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in July and I could never get it to work. I bought this to grind fresh pepper for steak. No matter how loose I adjust the knob the pepper never comes out except as a very fine powder. It looks like it should be well made. It says it is made in England. But it is definitely a dud. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: This pepper mill is so sturdy. It is smooth finish. Has great weight, not flimsy. The operation is superb. It grinds easy and perfectly. Adjusts easily. I have owned several pepper mills in different materials and styles. I love that the grinding mechanism will not grate plastic into my food like the cheapers ones do. When I can afford it I am buying the matching salt mill. I think this mill will last a long long time with proper care. So glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fresh ground pepper
customer_reviews.text: I like this. It grinds pepper to put on my meals and cook with. its got decent ergonomics and holds a decent amount. I don't like the knob on the top. it will unscrew its self especially if you twist the head both directions, which i usually do, this knob controls the grind setting, i think, so u will get different sizes of grinds, which is only marginally annoying, and need to 'tighten' the screw, which is really annoying. also a little fiddly to get corns into the body spilled a few on the way in, the cat plays with them so not wasted at least.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easily adjustable granule size
customer_reviews.text: I like the tall shape, the smooth texture and the steel mechanism. I have read many other reviews of paint chipping off almost right away - we have used it for 3 months and no such issue, it's still smooth and looks new. I do think it's overpriced but we knew that before purchasing and just couldn't find another one we liked better.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works great but remember to spank it after use
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine though there is often a bit of pepper "dust" on the bottom. After grinding it is good to spank the side to get the dust off or a pile will be underneath it when you put it down
customer_reviews.author: Peter B.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfies with these because, not only do they look so good in the kitchen, but they grind the Himalayan salt and black pepper pellets in a very fine manner.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jones

customer_reviews.title: After a while, it gets "clogged"
customer_reviews.text: Using standard sized peppercorns, it started out ok. But then months later, i could feel a lack of resistance when twisting. Adjusting the top cap doesn't help and you need to grind so much for so little output it's almost not worth the effort. I even emptied everything out and used compressed air to cleanse everything out. Putting everything back together results in the same weak resistance with very little coming out. I should have just settled with those cheap plastic disposal griders that sometimes come with the pepper spice. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ezra

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, finish chipping 2 Months later
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a family member and two months later it's chipping. Really disappointed as I intended for this to be a nice gift and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: laura harmon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pleasing design
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool, works great. Ask me again in 5 years. I bought this because for a while I have been using the salt and pepper sold in self grinding jars until I opened one up and noticed that the grinder is plastic and is considerably worn. So where is the plastic going? IN ME! No more plastic grinders. This seems well built and sturdy. And it is easily adjustable for fine or coarse - I like it coarse and some mills will not easily adapt.
customer_reviews.author: George Manlove

customer_reviews.title: Handsome until the finish falls off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the salt and pepper mills around four months ago. I have been pleased with their function. Unfortunately, the finish/stain is now coming off during normal use. I guess that I can restrain it when enough comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Schaupp

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and love the look but it is exhausting trying to grind any pepper. It just doesn't work. Quite possibly the worst purchase I've made. We hoped it would improve over time...just got worse. Using as a decoration now. : (
customer_reviews.author: Tara Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Peppermil
customer_reviews.text: I really should have read where this thing was made..dang it....Before anybody uses any these mills from overseas You better load it with cheap products and grind it a few times as the grind will produce super fine metal shavings....
customer_reviews.author: Will The Thrill

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe the good reviews on this pepper mill. BUYER BEWARE --> this thing does not grind pepper well at all. 1/2 full - totally full peppercorns I sit there for 5 min trying to get enough pepper to come out. Top constantly gets loose. Its 2 months old and I'm throwing it out. DO NOT BUY unless you want major frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Works great for an everyday at-home pepper grinder that you don’t mind having a few chips in. However, if you are concerned with aesthetics or would like to gift this to someone, know that the finish does chip (as shown in photos). But for the price it is a good value, especially considering the junk pepper grinders that are out there.
customer_reviews.author: NAC

customer_reviews.title: low price fine grinds well. Really a bad product.
customer_reviews.text: does not bring course enough for my tastes After using it for a month now I hate it. It grinds erratically. Sometimes fine other times it seems to be stuck and hard to even move. Adjusting the nut on top has little effect on the grind or ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Fling

customer_reviews.title: Leaves so much crystals behind!
customer_reviews.text: Upon moving this grinder when not grinding, leaks lots of crystals. Overall, I wouldn't recommend this product despite the price if you are using an expensive salt or annoyed by stuff dropping in your kitchen/dining room. Normally deserves 1 star, reason of second star is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gul Zerze

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good. I was using a cheap grinder, the one that comes with the pepper available at grocery stores and was tired of grinding for minutes trying to get some pepper out of it, so I bought this one. It works really well, you don't have to rotate the knob multiple times and the grinded pepper release all its flavor immediately and you can smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bernardi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used frequently. Finish starting to wear off. Needs to be filled often depending on frequency of use. Personally should've gone with a larger grinder. Great for the price. Will stick to purchasing Peugeot grinders from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Grinds perfect pepper easily!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but noinstructions. You have to unscrew the little nipple screw on top to open it up then fill the pepper chamber and then reassemble and tighten. Very easy! Makes grinding peooer effortless!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Peverill

customer_reviews.title: High quality and handsome build.
customer_reviews.text: High quality and handsome. This is the best pepper mill I’ve owned. I wish I would have purchased this one first rather than the cheap three other ones I tried before finally finding this mill.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive, but high quality
customer_reviews.text: A high quality pepper mill that feels good in the hand, looks gorgeous, and allows you to easily and quickly adjust the size of the peppercorns that you're grinding. The top is also very easy to remove and refill.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Gift for mom!
customer_reviews.text: My mom has been looking for a pepper mill for so long! I did a lot of research and found this was a great purchase. She absolutely loves it. The pepper comes out perfectly and it also looks so elegant in her kitchen. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality wood! Why is this not in your cart?!?
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this high quality pepper mill, my food can now be seasoned with evenly ground pepper! Especially nice that I am allowed to alter the size of the ground pepper bits depending on what foods I am eating. Refilling is simple: twist the silvered button off and pull away the wooden top to reveal the peppercorns' home.
customer_reviews.author: Willikan V.

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This pepper grinder works great. Only complaint is that it arrived with a knick in the wood. We are using anyway, but would have preferred to look perfect when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: It works but the grinding adjustment could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: The knob on top sets the grind size....at the same....when tightened, it makes it harder to twist the grinder. It takes too much grinding to get enough pepper out....I like more pepper which takes a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a week and got so excited that I purchased the salt mill too. This item is easy to use, easy to refill, and looks amazing on my counter. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Use this everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pepper grinder. I use it daily. It’s always on my counter next to the stove. Wood is beautiful and it’s a durable staple equipment piece for cooking
customer_reviews.author: noreen meeker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bit made in China compromises quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely designed and grinds well. However, made in China doesn’t last long unfortunately. So i don’t expect a long time ise with this product.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pepper grinder! Didn’t like that the amazon driver threw it on my porch, I thought something had fell from a tree it was that load!! If it had glass in the pkg it would have been toast!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Kersey

customer_reviews.title: Classic Pepper Mill
customer_reviews.text: I've had zero issues. It's tight and responsive to adjustments in the grind and looks great. Good size too. Would recommend for your table or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: I generally like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the grind of the pepper mill but it will NOT stay properly adjusted. I have to turn the thumb screw before almost every grinding. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: RidgeRunner

customer_reviews.title: Absolute JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely aweful. I spent so much on this only to have it stop working after about 4 months. Tried to fix it but just couldn’t. Salt shaker is same way. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: T-Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars if there were instructions on how to adjust grinder. Default settings seems fine so far. Easy to use and much better than the grinder I've been fighting with the last few years. It works!
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a nice pepper grinder for literally years, and so far, after a month of having this one I am more than satisfied. Easy to use, easy to refill, easy to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: For the price, decent, no brainer
customer_reviews.text: Considering price alone, this is a pretty awesome mill. I hate having to fill all the time but perhaps i should have thought about that before buying the small one-on me. Sturdy build, plenty of grind sizes - only complaint is the knob for desired grind seems to change/come loose far more often than it should, judging solely by my previous mill experiences. Still highly recomend this beauty but go for the bigger size if you cook alot AND love fresh ground pepper - i live alone and still have to fill this every 4-5 days. 97% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Silly McNutty

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 12.5” pepper mill and haven’t been disappointed. It stores plenty of peppercorns and the adjustability is great. Sometimes the adjustment screw loosens and doesn’t stay where you set it which is my only complaint. However, it’s not a big deal to readjust especially for the price. The fresh pepper makes a world of difference and I can’t go back to the store bought stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Wood peels off
customer_reviews.text: it does the job. the pain on the wood peels off. it makes it look really cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good grinder, broke after 2 yrs.
customer_reviews.text: After 2yrs. of moderate to heavy use, I really like pepper, the black plastic piece on the inside of the grinder broke. It's purpose was to maintain spring tension so the adjustment nut would not come loose. The grinder still works but the top adjustment nut loosens easily during use causing your pepper to come out in increasingly larger chunks. I wish they just made this piece metal instead of cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T. Haase

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not grind pepper. We’ve been trying it a while and we can’t get pepper to come out
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: but it is a little too tall to comfortably fit in the hand
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I bought this (should have read the description a tad better), but it is a little too tall to comfortably fit in the hand. That being said, it does a fabulous job grinding pepper, and offers many different settings that allow complete customization. The quality of the wood is also beautiful, and I am glad to have this as a staple for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Michie Dressner

customer_reviews.title: Love this grinder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and very nice grind. I would purchase this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: S. Seward

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Product was terrible and the bottom was completed chipped and will not work! All 5 star reviews are probably paid. Do not buy this product will not recommend cheap and poorly made!
customer_reviews.author: BonkersTheCat

customer_reviews.title: Beware: stain chips off after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom and I'm extremely disappointed. I thought this was a premium item, but as the title states, after a couple months, the stain starts to chip off and ruin the grinder. Do not but.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The best wooden mill I have bought!
customer_reviews.text: It works flawlessly! Feels great in your hands. I have bought others of different materials that did not work as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Love this grinder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grinder! Don't notice any smell as some of the reviewers stated. Adjusts easily and seems to hold the setting fairly well. Best I have seen in this price range. Don't see any need to spend more, unless you want a larger unit. Will be purchasing the matching salt grinder soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nonya

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks and works great but it has been less than 4 months and this is how it looks. I wish I could return it. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Omayra Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pepper mill
customer_reviews.text: Been using this pepper grinder for a year. Liked it so much I gave one as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Rich H

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pepper Mill
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift and is really nice looking and works well.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: This one is great because it's small and doesn't take up a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of pepper mills where I can put my own pepper, not the store pre-packaged ones. This one is great because it's small and doesn't take up a lot of counter space but also, the pepper doesn't have time to get stale, if that makes sense. I just ordered the salt mill today. I cook quite a bit and having good quality tools is essential for a good cook. Manja manja
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to fill. No instructions that are legible
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to fill . Screw cap on top is difficult to replace as threads engage at an angle No instructions for changing courseness of grain pattern. What little instructions that come with it the tag attached are too small to read. For the price it is no bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dallas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great pepper grinder
customer_reviews.text: I could not ask for a better pepper grinder this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: justeen wade

customer_reviews.title: great investment for anyone who cooks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a whim one night while I was cooking after several glasses of wine. I was hesitant to spend so much on a non-necessity, but freshly ground pepper really does make a huge difference. I love it so much and cannot imagine going back to the pre-ground stuff. This one works well, looks good, and is easy to refill with the whole peppercorns - which, by the way, are a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Clackner

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for course sea salt.
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic addition next to my old Vic Firth peppermill. I'm curious if the salt will corrode the metal over time, but it grinds beautifully now.
customer_reviews.author: David Cardenal

customer_reviews.title: Buy a grinder with a handle.
customer_reviews.text: This requires too much torque and it makes my wife's wrist hurt. It's pretty, if you're impressed by that sort of thing. I can't speak to its durability: we won't use it enough to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Badges? ... (see Blazing Saddles)

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: pepper grinder is smooth and adjustable... looks good on a table too... high quality wood....
customer_reviews.author: The BEST Fashion Maven

customer_reviews.title: Good materials, questionable consistency
customer_reviews.text: Good quality parts, just wish it came in clear to match. Also the size of salt grind is tough to keep consistant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great home use pepper mill.
customer_reviews.text: Would have got 5 stars IF only it could adjust grind courseness better and throw more pepper. Not good for commercial professional cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G Migita

customer_reviews.title: It not always about the size
customer_reviews.text: Peppering never felt so effortless! The extra length makes me feel fancy like an Olive Garden
customer_reviews.author: James Kelly Speck

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied and does the job. It is a little difficult to load the peppermill with peppercorns as the opening is small and restricted. However, once the peppercorns are in, it does the job. Aesthetically, it looks fairly nice
customer_reviews.author: Ben Choad

customer_reviews.title: Jams frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Jams regularly, have to shake it up and down or tap on counter to get peppercorns grinding again. I have tried a few different types of peppercorns.
customer_reviews.author: Book Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Good, somewhat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on description. I read on Amazon that it had a ceramic mechanism and capable of grinding salt. That is not the case. The wood shell is beautiful, yet the mechanism is stainless and only used for pepper. We returned it and I ordered a Zassenhaus 11.8-Inch Dark Stained Beech Salt Mill, which should arrive today. I will provide a review of that later.
customer_reviews.author: CB1966

customer_reviews.title: This is a great peppermill. I only thing is that since you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peppermill. I only thing is that since you adjust the grind size with the top nut, you have to re-adjust the grind size every time you fill it up with peppercorns. I wish I could re-fill it while maintaining the same grind. It's a super small detail, overall still a good peppermill!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Solid well made. The grinding mechanism is all steel, no plastic. Works outstandingly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C. Dilts

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: This is of good quality and very durable. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: buyer24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for using the coarse salt crystal
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple and much missed design. Had a similar version for years but it vanished. The course grind is perfect for salads or any other item.
customer_reviews.author: derf

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and mighty
customer_reviews.text: We didnt think it had settings for fine vs course. 3 months later, we figured it out. Its now great bc it can do both!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: while I do like coarsely ground pepper I probably wouldn't buy this model ...
customer_reviews.text: It's functional and attractive (as much as a pepper mill can be attractive) but my complaint is with its adjustability. It grinds the peppercorns decently but I can really only get a coarse to medium grind. No amount of adjusting the top knob rectifies this. Thus, while I do like coarsely ground pepper I probably wouldn't buy this model again - it has one job and it should perform it to the fullest.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Feltner

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for a reliable salt grinder.
customer_reviews.text: The finish wiped away on the bottom portion within a month of use. It will only grind certain types of salt. Not what Mom use to have.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It says England on the bottom but it is made in China, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this grinder!!!
customer_reviews.text: It may look nice. It may be expensive. It may have decent reviews....but this pepper grinder is crap. Cheaply made and grinds pepper so slow. It’s “adjustable” but that just means it slows down the grinding. Awful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Liebl

customer_reviews.title: Absolute great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love my pepper mill! Will be purchasing more for gifts. Very good quality and easy to handle over pots.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Useful, affordable, nice
customer_reviews.text: We like it! First pepper grinder that we have owned. It meets our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ferne

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very old pepper grinder I finally had to lay to rest :-( and when I got on Amazon to find its replacement, I didn't have any idea there were so many options! I chose this one because it seemed to have higher tech insides and I have to admit, it works great! I am now enjoying fresh ground pepper on my boiled eggs again in the morning! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S Gordon

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: equal to the product of the description, delivery and fast delivery. it fulfills its function very well
customer_reviews.author: Renzo del Oscar Cruz Caldas

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. After trying many different ones over the years, finally found one that works. Daily use for over a year now
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's a little darker in color then expected. Quite ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little darker in color then expected. Quite a bit more so than the picture. More of an espresso color.
customer_reviews.author: ErinB

customer_reviews.title: Works great, high quality, really pretty looking in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, high quality, really pretty looking in the kitchen. Cute and small.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: After having one its hard to remember life without it
customer_reviews.author: Deadstar

customer_reviews.title: This pepper mill isn't just pretty, it's does an excellent job
customer_reviews.text: This pepper mill isn't just pretty, it's does an excellent job. I actually bought it for myself for Christmas. I've been using an old one that was very ineffective and frustrating. The Cole and Mason mill feels great in my hands and the grinding mechanism is smooth and very effective. I just want to put pepper on everything!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Attaway

customer_reviews.title: Almost no plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a salt grinder that has no plastic in it and this is the best one so far. It does have one small piece of plastic inside on the inside of the lid but that is all. It's very attractive and works well. I'll probably buy a second one or different types of salt.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Good value and features
customer_reviews.text: Good size for both me and my wife. Best feature is very fine grind as well as more coarse. Easy to fill and mechanism is all metal.
customer_reviews.author: John Applebee

customer_reviews.title: Very classy
customer_reviews.text: Very classy. Sleek , smooth and very well built. A +
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott Frank

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for a wedding gift. He loves it! Good Looking, impressive size. Having freshly grated pepper when cooking and serving at the table is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Lower rim chipped at several places,disappointed given the price paid
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed by the item delivered,the exterior looks great but the bottom rim is chipped at multiple places and finishing is not as good as the upper part.Was hoping for classy looks and better quality given its price. Might have to return if I don’t hear back from Seller.
customer_reviews.author: vartika prakash

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is lovely..I'll like it even better when its mate, the pepper grinder arrives. It grinds really well! I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: krazycat

customer_reviews.title: Cole and Mason is my favorite brand of pepper mills and this behemoth is just ...
customer_reviews.text: Cole and Mason is my favorite brand of pepper mills and this behemoth is just what I was looking for so I don't need to refill it every couple days. Looks great, and the pepper just has a better flavor when using these mills.
customer_reviews.author: Seano

customer_reviews.title: ONE HELL OF A PEPPER GRINDER!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast!! It makes my large Johnsonville brat pack hands look small and it grinds pepper as smooth as one could ask for!! Would definitely buy again, I may need the matching salt grinder!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: hence a taller one would be best
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Should get taller size since my hand takes up most of the length of the body, hence a taller one would be best
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made
customer_reviews.text: Really nicely made pepper mill. Will likely order a matching salt shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking and well made. It does not work quite as well as I like so I took one star off. I already own a very nice pepper mil and wanted another. I will keep this as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and is very well made. You can adjust how fine you want to grind the salt. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stlibraryreader

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder so far
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome. Works like a charm. Very happy with this grinder. The ground size adjustment works great. And it seems like it will last a long time. Hope it does.
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY CD

customer_reviews.title: Best pepper mill I've had!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several pepper mills through out the years and none of them compare to the quality of the Cole and Mason Pepper mill. The grinding mechanism turns smoothly and with minimal effort. The ground pepper is consistent in size, no big chunks nor clumps of pepper stuck to mill's mechanism. Mill is easy to open for filling. I would definitely repurchase and can recommend this mill with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: lisa s

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pepper grinder.
customer_reviews.text: This pepper grinder is perfect for the budding chef. I love using it to make a pepper crusted steak. The little knob at the top easily adjusts the size of the grind. I felt like a Michelin star chef from the compliments from friends and family
customer_reviews.author: It happens to the best of us

customer_reviews.title: Came to my house perfect condition, easy to use and look exactly like ...
customer_reviews.text: Came to my house perfect condition, easy to use and look exactly like the picture. Still working really well up til now, besides the paint came off a bit on the bottom nothing should be complain abt this product. Glad I did ordered this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy ong

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Very smooth
customer_reviews.text: Very professional and impressive looking and feeling mill. Love it. Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Deserae

product_meta.title: COLE & MASON Capstan Wood Salt Grinder - Wooden Mill Includes Precision Mechanism, 6.5 inch
feature_bullets: Diamond sharpened ceramic precision mechanism creates a smooth and even turn
Easily fill the salt mill by removing the top
Conveniently select between fine or coarse granules by adjusting the knob on top
Traditional 6.5 inch tall wooden mill design with premium balance and weight
Lifetime Guarantee, hand wash with damp cloth, do not submerge
